p.k: Thirst for Power / All Trick No Treat / To Tame the Perilous Skies! Axel and his toys deploy the Joyride in a ship to ship battle against Dr. Nautilus who has punctured a water main to flood the sewers and established himself as Admiral Nautilus. / On Halloween Axel gets too caught up in the scares and loses track of the fun - just in time for an infiltration by the worst trick 'r' treater of all Madcap! / With Axel's drone-wing broken the team must find another way to stop Madcap and his minions as they take to the skies in toy airplanes for an aerial assault on the city park.
